topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555b8bc2636872567b091200#post_555b8bc2636872567b091200
The artist for that drawing is Tom Fischbach; aka the creator for Twokinds.  Twokinds is a webcomic about furries and that.  It's by no means bad, but it's not amazing either; I give it a average rating.

You know the trope by now: races have racial prejudice against others, main characters bone and are different species, blah, blah, blah.

The artist's deviantart is:
http://twokinds.deviantart.com/

If you're not interested in the comic then just watch his deviantart cause it's pretty okay cause it's like a mix between comic style and anime style without fucking it up.

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555b8deb6368722d7a7b2400#post_555b8deb6368722d7a7b2400
If you want a repository of decent furry comics then check out "katbox":http://katbox.net/

They're all pretty okay; nothing "11/10 Mountain dew! Doritos! Comic of the year!" good, but still pretty okay.


Las Lindas (by Chalosan), Carribean Blue (by freelancemanga) and Rascals (by Mastergodai) probably have the best quality art cause they're the ones that do the anime-cartoon mix style art and are actually pretty good at it.

Also those three while they do sexy furry stuff it's not bad by any means.
Their art accounts are:
http://mastergodai.deviantart.com/
http://chalodillo.deviantart.com/
http://freelancemanga.deviantart.com/


There's a lot of sexy furry stuff out there and a lot of pretty decent comics and stuff out there; I would suggest trying it out cause there is some pretty good stuff out there.

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555b90e1636872192ef00700#post_555b90e1636872192ef00700
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555b903c6368722d7a892800#post_555b903c6368722d7a892800
...........Do you think i don't look at porn?[/bq]
No; just that not a lot of people don't look at furry porn cause they think it all sucks and they never see the good stuff.


Typical conversations when it comes to sexy furry stuff in a nutshell-
Person, "All furry porn is terribly drawn!"
Me, "Not all of it is terribly drawn; it's just that the good stuff often times doesn't get as much attention *shows them a artist*"
Person, "I didn't know that there were good furry artists!"

There are some really good furry artists out there if you're interested; for every bad furry artists there's a good furry artist.  Some times you go "oh god!  What the fuck?!" and some times you go "oh god yes!"
